enhanced_description: Asanify, an Indian Techstars portfolio company, offers an AI-based HRMS, Payroll, and Sales Enablement solution primarily for Startups and SMEs. It aims to help businesses enhance revenues, save costs, and ease management burdens. The platform leverages cutting-edge AI technology to engage employees through popular chat interfaces like Whatsapp, Slack, and Microsoft Teams. Key features include proprietary salary structuring and an automated sales onboarding solution designed to transform employee onboarding, improve motivation, and boost retention. Asanify is positioned as a comprehensive HR and payroll solution, supporting a range of HR functions from talent acquisition and management to workforce administration and total rewards.
